title: Lag!
body:
On the loading screen where it shows he champions and their skins, It shows an orange circle and 500+ lag. During games, I often cannot move and abilities stop working. I click, my champion moves 5 seconds later. I have a hard time playing games because of this and I hope you guys can help me resolve this issue. 

Thanks

replies.body: It sounds like you're experiencing lag spike, which can be caused by your network problem failing to hold a strong connection to our game server.  I suggest running a [log reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)to get a better overview of what's really going on.  The results will also provide you with a list of steps to help get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any further issues!
